title: [Large-scale] Transaction Shell-Based Language Courseware Development Project: Text and Vocabulary-Centered Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language learning theories (grammar, vocabulary, reading comprehension), educational management experience, proficiency in digital content creation tools
context.additional_context: Development of customized language education solutions for advanced learners in manager/leader roles operating in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. It focuses on improving learners' writing and text analysis skills.

learning_goals: Learners design three or more language learning strategies, such as integrated reading-writing strategies, using a transactional shell system.
Learners develop two complete language coursewares by applying grammar and vocabulary content to predefined templates.
In a PBL environment, learners revise courseware prototypes at least three times incorporating peer feedback to enhance expressive and reading comprehension skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
